dcterms:description: OpenLORIS-Object is designed for incremental recognition of common objects in office or home scenarios, addressing challenges such as different illumination conditions, occlusions, and camera-object distances.
dcterms:title: OpenLORIS

dcterms:creator: Y. P. Loh
C. S. Chan
dcterms:description: The Exclusively Dark dataset is a collection of 7,363 low-light images captured in various conditions, designed for indoor and outdoor object detection.
dcterms:title: ExDARK

dcterms:creator: C. Sakaridis
D. Dai
L. Van Gool
dcterms:description: ACDC is a benchmark dataset for semantic segmentation in adverse visual conditions, comprising 4006 images evenly distributed across various weather conditions.
dcterms:title: ACDC
